function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular disinfection of indoor surfaces, proper ventilation, air quality monitoring","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement improved ventilation systems and air filtration, as well as regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation ducts","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase fresh air ventilation, minimize indoor crowding, and implement air quality monitoring","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication and training on guidelines","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasizing the importance of hvac measures in conjunction with other hygiene strategies","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase outdoor air intake and disable demand-controlled ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use merv-13 air filters, seal filter edges, and employ portable room air cleaners with hepa filters","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extend system operation hours, consider 24/7 operation where feasible","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install hepa filters in centralized air-conditioning systems and maintain proper filter size and efficiency","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement proper shielding and safety measures when using uvgi lamps","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement personalized-air-supply, local-exhaust, or all-fresh-air operation, set hepa filters or uvgi in the occupant’s breathing zone, and control temperature and humidity based on ashrae guidelines","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engage in an integrated design process to consider appropriate infection control strategies early in the building design, especially for buildings with a higher risk of transmission, and implement ashrae guidelines","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strictly implement the latest published standards and guidelines by ashrae, especially in buildings with a higher risk of transmission, and engage in an integrated design process to consider appropriate infection control strategies","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase outdoor air supply, maintain social distancing, and regular window opening","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adjusting ventilation and air handling unit operations to reduce the spread of viruses","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switching to 100% outdoor air and proper filtration of virus particles","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful monitoring and control of indoor temperature and humidity to reduce virus viability","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular replacement and maintenance of filters, use of effective air cleaning devices like hepa filters and uv cleaning equipment","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintain indoor humidity within moderate range, avoid very low and very high humidity conditions","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of heat recovery equipment to control leakages, and compensation by increasing outdoor air ventilation","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearing masks, gloves, and respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","category":"Personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularly opening outer windows and increasing outdoor air through ventilation systems","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using in-duct uv-c devices for decontaminating recirculated air only, avoiding ozone-emitting devices in occupied spaces","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Properly maintaining and operating hvac systems, maintaining pressure differentials between zones","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and inspection of exhaust system to ensure proper functioning.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of automated window control systems to ensure proper window closure.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hvac systems to control temperature and humidity within recommended ranges, regular monitoring of temperature and humidity levels.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of a mechanical exhaust system or use of a fire anti-smoke exhaust system","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of two-way energy-saving ventilation machines ","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement proper ventilation systems, use air cleaners with hepa filters, and increase outdoor air in air-conditioning systems.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and replacement of hvac filters, avoidance of chemical disinfection, and proper operation of indoor air cleaners.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper maintenance and operation of heat recovery equipment, avoidance of rotary heat exchangers, and monitoring of pressure differentials between zones.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of pressure differentials, proper maintenance of pressurized ventilator and exhaust systems","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular inspection, cleaning, and maintenance of hvac systems, proper positioning of outdoor air vents","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular inspection of drainage and water systems, unobstructed uplift ventilation pipe, use of sterilizers and equipment to ensure water safety","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase outdoor air ratio, operate ventilation system before occupancy, and open windows for ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further research and consensus building on the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing infection risk","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardize guidelines for operation of air-conditioning systems and air cleaners based on scientific evidence and best practices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of pressure differentials, use of mechanical ventilation systems to maintain airflow direction","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper adjustment and balancing of air pressure, regular inspection and maintenance of heat recovery devices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consult with a qualified environmental expert to determine the best setpoints for the specific building and conditions","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive ventilation assessment and consider the use of air purifiers and uv lamps","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consult with researchers and disease experts to understand the latest findings on temperature and humidity effects on virus inactivation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure proper humidification when relative humidity is below 40%","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase outdoor air supply and maintain effective airflow patterns","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance of air filters and use of portable room air cleaners","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further studies to determine the transmission and implement necessary precautions","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to ashrae guidelines, strategic planning prior to building opening","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular checks of water seals and ventilation pipes, proper toilet flushing practices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement policies to ensure equal access to housing and address housing inequality","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"}]}
